item.title: Using langchain to interview myself about my skills
item.description: Premise Ok, got this half baked idea , combine my #brag-document with the available [[langchain]] QA chains into a proof of concept maybe I can call [[langchain interview me 2023-feb]] So I’m going to throw a bunch of my source material together, language based, accessible as plain text doc, and then I will run the Link examples that provide references, citations, Ok, so for accumulating my information, ```python import yaml import tempfile from pathlib import Path from datetime import datetime import pytz def utc_now(): return datetime.
